reviewText: It wasn't what I expected. I was looking for a cd with the class.
Not my fav Sadie offering but it is okay.

Received my DVD and popped it in immediately-- to my dismay it was damaged and couldn't watch to completion. From what I did see the video seemed to have good information but not executed in a way that I could follow well. The yogis in the video are dynamic with passionate energy -- and have good information to share but might consider organizing how they approach the teaching of it.  Still watching for other works from these two!
